attributes.action: Stop the Northern Irish Assembly from collapsing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the Northern Irish Assembly from being able to just walk out when there is a difference in opinion, the assembly should operate as normal in the publics interest until the issue is resolved. They need to grow up and sort out our country as the recession hits home and stop arguing over petty tit for tat decisions, there are real issues and policies waiting to be signed that can help their constituents.

rejection.details: This should be directed to the Northern Ireland Executive.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
